short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Painting tool for drednot.io game. Paint any image as pixel art using Holo!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DredArt - QOL extension for drednot.io / Deep Space Airships / Dredark

Allows the user to create pixel art quickly and painlessly - from converting a regular image to pixel art, to painting it flawlessly in-game, saving up to several hours if painting it without the holographic stencils that DredArt has to offer

Consists of few modules:
- Designer-  pixel art converter - Generates fine pixel arts from ordinary images.
- Painter- Helps in painting art pieces generated in Render.
Uses Holo technology - stencils that show where to put the paint, effectively reducing painting time.
- And More Soon!

DredArt 2 is constantly being developed!

Join the discord server for discussion, events and fun!
https://discord.gg/uNgD6vv67c
